name: Nicole
greetingText: I really like your name btw!!!
wishText: Hey bebe, even though we havent met in person yet, you already mean so much to me. Every day, I feel closer to you, and I cant wait for the moment we finally see each other. You make my days brighter, and just talking to you makes me so happy. No matter the distance, my feelings for you are real, and I hope you always know how special you are to me. Im really lucky to have you in my life. ❤️
